issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Tapping on the XML proporties table row does not do give us any xml proporties.

Not a Regression, occurs with 2.0.2GA

Steps to reproduce:
1.Build kitchen sink for mobile web in titanium studio.
2.Type the ip address of your laptop into the mobile device's web browser.(safari for iphone & IE for windows phone). 
3.Hit go or enter.
4.Kitchen sink will fire up in the browser.
5.Tap on platform tab.
6.Tap on the XHR table row.
7.Tap on the XML proporties table row.
8.Notice that we do not get any page or screen with XML proporties on it.

Actual result:
1.We do not get any screen or page with XML proporties on it on tapping the XML proporties table row.

Expected result:
1.Tapping on the XML proporties table row gives us a screen with XML data on it & the "response text" and "response XML" should be "null".
fields.summary: MobileWeb:Platform-->XHR-->XHR proporties:Tapping on the XML proporties table row does not do give us any xml proporties.
fields.environment:
Tested on :
Titanium Studio : 2.1.0.201206062004
SDK Version : 2.1.0.v20120607000247
Iphone 4.3.5
windows phone mango

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
